metadata.title: CVE-2018-10981 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (host OS infinite loop) in situationswhere a QEMU device model attempts to make invalid transitions betweenstates of a request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenevtchn1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenforeignmemory1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxengnttab1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenhypfs1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenmisc4.16 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenstore4 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxentoolcore1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxentoollog1 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.16-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.16-arm64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.16-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-common - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-arm64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-utils-4.16 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-utils-common - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xenstore-utils - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6').
